\u2728New Flights Input files.Flight lines file_path_COMMENT: Select the file that has the flight lines
\u2728New Flights Input files.Take-off file path_COMMENT: Select the file that has takeoff points

Settings.max_flt_size_COMMENT: this is the max size of flight that will be auto-generated
Settings.max_number_of_lines_per_flight_COMMENT: this will speed up the computation
Settings.line_direction_reverse_COMMENT: normally first line is south to  north
Settings.line_flight_order_reverse_COMMENT: this will reverse the order in which lines are flown
Settings.lead_in_COMMENT: added to the beginning of each line
Settings.lead_out_COMMENT: added to the end of each line
Settings.prefer_even_number_of_lines_COMMENT: if selected, app will try to generate an even number of lines per flt and tof

smooth_turns.add_smooth_turns_COMMENT: if selected, app will use  'turn_segment_length' and 'turn_diameter' to add smooth turns
smooth_turns.turn_segment_length_COMMENT: minimum distance between waypoints during turns
smooth_turns.turn_diameter_COMMENT: meters, usually same as line spacing
